nodes.description: 2001年8月，Sbarro餐厅遭自杀式爆炸袭击，造成15人死亡（包括15岁受害者Malki Roth），14名额外受害者死亡，130人受伤
nodes.support_text: Malki Roth, 15, from Jerusalem...was one of 15 people murdered in the bombing of the restaurant...Ahlam Tamimi...drove the suicide bomber who carried out the suicide bombing at the Sbarro restaurant

nodes.description: Ahlam Tamimi因策划该袭击被判16次终身监禁，其言论显示拒绝承认以色列存在
nodes.support_text: Ahlam Tamimi...was sentenced to 16 life terms in prison...Tamimi’s comment was prophetic: 'I’m not sorry for what I did. I will get out of prison and I refuse to recognize Israel's existence'

nodes.description: 2023年3月，以色列政府批准释放包括Ahlam Tamimi在内的1026名囚犯，以换取被绑架士兵Shalit的归还被扣押
nodes.support_text: the Cabinet’s approval...to win the return of kidnapped soldier Gilad Shalit

nodes.description: Ahlam Tamimi获释后拒绝公开道歉，预言将再次实施恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: the terrorist’s comment was prophetic. It's reasonable to think she will seek to do the same again

nodes.description: 受害者母亲Frimet Roth在获知释放决定后发表声明，谴责政府交易与恐怖主义循环
nodes.support_text: Frimet Roth...wrote on her 'This Ongoing War' website...the government that prosecuted this monstrous woman has agreed to the satanic transaction

nodes.description: 巴勒斯坦官方媒体为Ahlam Tamimi及女囚犯庆祝获释，称其为‘光荣囚犯’
nodes.support_text: Official Palestinian Authority media recently stated, 'We wish her freedom - she and [the rest of] our glorious female prisoners'
Ahlam Tamimi...drove the suicide bomber who carried out the suicide bombing at the Sbarro restaurant

edges.support_text: Ahlam Tamimi...was sentenced to 16 life terms in prison but is to be freed
the terrorist’s comment was prophetic...will seek to do the same again
after learning of the Cabinet’s approval...the government that prosecuted this monstrous woman has agreed
the Cabinet’s approval...Official Palestinian Authority media recently stated
the terrorist’s comment was prophetic...Frimet Roth...wrote on her website
加入哈马斯后策划实施自杀式爆炸袭击
